duties_responsibilities.duty: Process securities transactions with a high degree of accuracy, including new account establishment, security issue setup, trade tickets, settlements, payments, and pledging.
Utilize technology and resources to perform functions efficiently, including communications, recordkeeping, and reporting.
Research and resolve issues independently, providing knowledge sharing with team members to strengthen understanding of processes and controls.
Participate in proactive team efforts to achieve departmental and company goals, remaining knowledgeable of changes affecting securities processes.
Maintain good relationships with internal and external customers, ensuring compliance with policies, procedures, code of conduct, and regulatory guidelines.
Provide assistance to colleagues, perform marketing endeavors, and continuously update skills through professional training.
Remain composed under pressure and respond to customer and coworker concerns regularly, while maintaining a positive attitude.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent (Bachelor's degree preferred)
